scripts.init: npm ci && node init.js && dotenv -e .env -- npm run bootstrap -w apps/api && node ./packages/bin/dist/runUntil.js "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envCli wait-port ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}${API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo run init" && node post-init.js
scripts.generate:directus:types: node ./packages/bin/dist/runUntil.js "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo run generate:directus:types"
scripts.prod:update: npm ci && dotenv -e .env -- npm run migrate:latest -w apps/api && dotenv -e .env -- npm run schema:import -w apps/api
scripts.build:force: node ./packages/bin/dist/runUntil.js "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envCli wait-port ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}${API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo build --force"
scripts.build: node ./packages/bin/dist/runUntil.js "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envCli wait-port ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}${API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo build"
scripts.test: node ./packages/bin/dist/runUntil.js "dotenv -e .env -- npm run start -w api" "envCli wait-port ${NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL}${API_PING_PATH} && dotenv -v FORCE_COLOR=1 -- turbo test"
